name: set_heatingand_cooling_sizing_factors

arguments.name: htg_sz_factor
arguments.display_name: Heating Sizing Factor (eg 15 = 125% of required heating capacity

arguments.name: clg_sz_factor
arguments.display_name: Coolinig Sizing Factor (eg 15 = 115% of required cooling capacity

name_xml: Set Heating and Cooling Sizing Factors
modeler_description: Set the whole-model heating sizing factor and the whole-model cooling sizing factor to user specified values.
